bibl.title: Magic Syncretism in Late Antiquity: Some Examples from Papyri and Magical Gems.
bibl.note: Examines some texts on papyri and some magical amulets where elements of the older national religions (Egyptian, Greek, Roman, Persian, Jewish and Christian) may be found in a new extraordinary mixture. - Non vidimus.

bibl.title: Ilu. Revista de ciencias de las religiones

bibl.seg: SFAMENI Carla, Magic Syncretism in Late Antiquity: Some Examples from Papyri and Magical Gems.
Ilu. Revista de ciencias de las religiones 6 (2001) pp. 183-199.

Examines some texts on papyri and some magical amulets where elements of the older national religions (Egyptian, Greek, Roman, Persian, Jewish and Christian) may be found in a new extraordinary mixture. - Non vidimus.
